about_the_game:
About This Game

Enhance Your Digital TTRPG Experience with the Builders Edition!

The RPG Engine (Builders Edition) is the ultimate upgrade for those seeking complete control and limitless creativity in crafting their roleplaying worlds. This edition unlocks all features, giving you unparalleled freedom to build, customize, and host immersive 3D environments.

Craft Your Unique Worlds

As a Builder, elevate your world-building capabilities with advanced tools and an intuitive interface. Design and manage intricate 3D maps with expanded features:

  • Build new custom maps and form them into campaigns. 

  • Advanced Terrain Sculpting: Create complex landscapes, including overhangs, caves, and paint the terrain. 

  • Extensive Prop Library: Access a vast collection of props and items to enrich your world- currently at 12,500 assets (far greater than the fine array given to free players).

  • Build new custom maps and form them into campaigns.

  • Custom Characters: Develop unique characters with advanced customization options.

  • Enhanced Dynamic Control: Equip and unequip weapons and items, and import images as flat maps, signs, or standee characters.

  • Import images as flat maps, signs, or even standee characters. 

  • Equip premade and kitbashed weapons as well as items to players in your world. 

  • Join any game: Builders can join any available game, regardless of the level of the host. So two Builders can have two Base players in a game with them.

  • Limited Hosting: As a host, invite one Base player to your game or bring that Base player spot with you to any game you join, allowing seamless multiplayer experiences.

Engage as Adventurous Players

Dive into meticulously crafted 3D worlds with your friends. Experience rich gameplay features, including:

  • Exploration: Navigate through expansive, custom-built environments.

  • Character Control: Animate and control your characters with precision.

  • Assign standardized and custom characters to your players, enhancing their agency as you see fit.

  • Combat Visualization: Engage in dynamic and thrilling combat scenarios.

  • Real-Time Communication: Chat with fellow players to enhance storytelling.

  • Special Effects: Enhance your narrative with stunning visual effects.

Community-Driven Workshop Sharing

Access a treasure trove of assets and worlds through the Steam Workshop. Share and download maps, characters, items, and player sheets created by others. Our commitment to community growth ensures that Workshop sharing remains free forever.

Beyond TTRPGs

The RPG Engine's versatile interface is perfect for various creative applications, such as:

  • Brainstorming Sessions

  • Storyboarding Projects

  • Visual Storytelling

  • Level Design Prototyping

Ready to Elevate Your Adventure?

Download The RPG Engine Builders Edition today and unlock the full potential of your interactive worlds. Enjoy the freedom to host and create without limits, bringing your imaginative visions to life!

Need More?
The base version provides an introduction to The RPG Engine. Builders Edition DLC gives you more tools and the ability to bring one Base player into the party pool. GameMasters Edition makes you the ultimate GM with endless seats for Base players, even if you aren’t the game’s host (they join free!).
